name: It Will Be Mine
description:
It Will Be Mine is the winning submission made in 36 hours at the SEA Game Jam. This action game is made by Haikal Izzuddin, Zee Yee, Nikko, Ruby and Chang Zhen. Jam hosted by LevelUP KL and IGDA Malaysia.

How many times have I been put down?

It doesn't matter. Even if I'll have to pave a path with the bodies of my own kind ...

... it will be mine.
